Package DB

Class DBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • DB.DBHelper
  • public class DBHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class containing static methods to avoid repeating similar code

    • Method Detail

      • executeAndCheckInsertWithReturnId

        public static long executeAndCheckInsertWithReturnId​(java.sql.PreparedStatement statement)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes an already prepared PreparedStatement and returns the id
        Parameters:
        statement - The pre-prepared preparedStatement.
        Returns:
        Long id, id of row inserted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if execution failed to return an id.

      • executeAndCheckInsert

        public static void executeAndCheckInsert​(java.sql.PreparedStatement statement)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Executes a pre-prepared PreparedStatement and checks that something was really inserted
        Parameters:
        statement - a pre-prepared preparedStatement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if no new rows were inserted through the execution of the statement.

      • addRating

        public static void addRating​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                             java.lang.String tableName,
                             java.lang.String FKName,
                             long id,
                             Rating rating)
        Adds a rating to one of the several rating-tables in our database
        Parameters:
        conn - DB-connection
        tableName - Name of the rating-table to insert into
        FKName - Name of the foreign-key column in the specified rating-table
        id - ID to put into the foreign-key column
        rating - the Rating to insert.

      • addComment

        public static void addComment​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                              java.lang.String tableName,
                              java.lang.String FKName,
                              long id,
                              Kommentar comment)
        Adds a comment to one of the several comment-tables in our database
        Parameters:
        conn - DB-connection
        tableName - Name of the comment-table to insert into
        FKName - Name of the foreign-key column in the specified comment-table
        id - ID to put into the foreign-key column
        comment - the comment to insert

      • addCrewMember

        public static void addCrewMember​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                 java.lang.String tableName,
                                 java.lang.String FKName,
                                 long id,
                                 CrewMember member)
        adds a CrewMember to one of the (extremely) many crewmember-tables in our database
        Parameters:
        conn - DB-connection
        tableName - Name of the crewMember-table to insert into (based on filmType and crewType)
        FKName - Name of the foreign-key column in the specified crewMember-table
        id - ID to put into the foreign-key column
        member - the member

      • addActor

        public static void addActor​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                            java.lang.String tableName,
                            java.lang.String FKName,
                            long id,
                            Skuespiller skuespiller)
        adds a CrewMember to one of the many actor-tables in our database
        Parameters:
        conn - DB-connection
        tableName - Name of the actor-table to insert into (based on filmType)
        FKName - Name of the foreign-key column in the specified actor-table
        id - ID to put into the foreign-key column
        skuespiller - the actor to insert
